div.p: This work was conceived while the author stayed at the National Atmospheric and Oceanic Administration’s (NOAA) Earth System Research Laboratory (ESRL) as a Cooperative Institute for Research in Environmental Sciences (CIRES) sabbatical visiting fellow. I wish to express gratitude to Chuck Brock, Dave Fahey, Graham Feingold, Piers Forster, Franziska Glaßmeier and Axel Lauer for their critical reading of and detailed comments on manuscript drafts, and to Steven Baughcum, Paul DeMott, Andrew Gettelman, Volker Grewe, Carolin Klinger, Thomas Koop, Eric Jensen, Chuck Long, Rick Miake-Lye, Pat Minnis, Rich Moore, Roberto Paoli, Michael Ponater, Mattia Righi, Simon Unterstraßer and Xavier Vancassel for giving me valuable feedback on specific topics. I would especially like to thank Ann Reiser and Annie Davis for editorial assistance and work on the visuals. I am deeply grateful to my hosts at ESRL, Dave Fahey and Graham Feingold, for their hospitality and insights that continue to catalyse my work.
